name: Ventas y Utilidad por Cliente
query:
select
d.clave as "Clave",
d.customer as "Cliente:Link/Customer:180",
sum(b.qty) as "Cantidad Articulos::140", 
SUM(@Importe := (case when d.currency = 'USD' then b.amount * 20 else b.amount end)) as "Importe Ventas:Float:150", 
SUM(@ImporteCosto := (c.last_purchase_rate)*(b.qty)) as "Importe Costo:Float:140",
SUM(@Utilidad := (@Importe)-(@ImporteCosto)) AS "Utilidad:Float:140",
@Porcentaje := null  AS "Porcentaje::140",
d.agente as 'Vendedor::150', 
f.customer_type as "Tipo de Cliente::100", 
f.direccion as "Direccion::500"

from
`tabSales Invoice Item` b left join
`tabItem` c on b.item_code = c.item_code left join
`tabSales Invoice` d on b.parent = d.name left join
`tabCustomer` f on d.customer = f.customer_name left join
`tabvariables` e on d.name = e.parent
where d.docstatus = 1 and d.posting_date >= %(d.from_date)s and d.posting_date <= %(d.to_date)s and b.qty >= '0'
GROUP BY d.customer desc
